chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
s: spec A
e3: DTbin this W s
e2: DTbin this W s
e1: DTbin this W s

Goal:
leq e1 e2 -> leq e2 e3 -> leq e1 e3

Premises:
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
leq = fun e1 e2 : DTbin s => e1 <== e2 : DTbin s -> DTbin s -> Prop
spec = fun A : Type => (pre * post A)%type : Type -> Type Arguments spec _%type_scope
nid = nat : Set
stsepE : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A) (e1 e2 : SerTop.DTbin this W s), e1 = e2 < -> e1 = e2
leq_refl : forall e : DTbin s, leq e e
Record DTbin (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A) : Type := DTbin_make { prog_of : SerTop.prog W A this; _ : prog_of \In has_spec this W s } Arguments DTbin.DTbin _ _ [A]%type_scope Arguments DTbin.DTbin_make [this W] [A]%type_scope [s prog_of]
spec_of : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), DT this W A -> spec A
with_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A), SerTop.DTbin this W s -> DT this W A
DTbin.prog_of : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A), SerTop.DTbin this W s -> SerTop.prog W A this
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
DT_ind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Prop), (forall (s : spec A) (d : SerTop.DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_sind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> SProp), (forall (s : spec A) (d : SerTop.DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_rect : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Type), (forall (s : spec A) (d : SerTop.DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_rec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Set), (forall (s : spec A) (d : SerTop.DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
Actions.send_act_safe : world -> forall p : protocol, nid -> Label -> send_trans (coh p) -> seq nat -> nid -> state -> Prop
DTbin_make : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : spec A) (prog_of : SerTop.prog W A this), prog_of \In has_spec this W s -> SerTop.DTbin this W s
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv.PWIExports.InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (InductiveInv.PWIExports.ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
has_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), spec A -> Simpl_Pred (SerTop.prog W A this)
Actions.send_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label), getProtocol W l = p -> forall st : send_trans (coh p), st \In snd_trans p -> seq nat -> nid -> Actions.action W (seq nat) this
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_safe : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s1 s2 r -> Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s1
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_total : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s : state), Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s -> exists (s' : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s s' r
InductiveInv.PWIExports.InductiveInv = InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv : protocol -> (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> Type Arguments InductiveInv.PWIExports.InductiveInv _ _%function_scope
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
action = Actions.action : world -> Type -> nid -> Type Arguments action _ _%type_scope
Transitions.ReceiveTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_rcv : nat) (msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) (receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh), Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step -> Transitions.receive_trans coh
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s1 -> forall (s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s1 s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Inductive DT (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := with_spec : forall s : spec A, SerTop.DTbin this W s -> DT this W A Arguments DT _ _ _%type_scope Arguments with_spec [this W] [A]%type_scope [s]
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A ->...-> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop
Actions.tryrecv_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> Actions.action W (option (nid * nat * seq nat)) this
InductiveInv.PWIExports.ProtocolWithIndInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I -> Protocols.protocol
always_sc : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> seq schedule -> (state -> proc this W A -> Prop) -> Prop
step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
pstep : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
always : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> (state -> proc this W A -> Prop) -> Prop
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p

```coq
intros.
intros H1 H2.
apply leq_trans with (e2:=e2); assumption.
```
